domain.impl

Class LongTermScheduler

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • domain.impl.LongTermScheduler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SubmissionInterface, java.lang.Runnable

    public class LongTermScheduler
extends java.lang.Thread
implements SubmissionInterface
    This class is responsible for getting a path to a file and creating a `Process` instance with its contents, then submitting this new object to the `ShortTermScheduler` via an instance of `NotificationInterface`.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class java.lang.Thread

        java.lang.Thread.State, java.lang.Thread.UncaughtExceptionHandler

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class java.lang.Thread

        MAX_PRIORITY, MIN_PRIORITY, NORM_PRIORITY

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LongTermScheduler(int maxShortTermSchedulerLoad)
      Constructor for LongTermScheduler, accepts the max `ShortTermScheduler` load as argument, to balance the system's load.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void displaySubmissionQueue()
      Displays all the processes that are in the submission queue of this scheduler waiting to be submitted to the ShortTermScheduler.
      void run()
      When the `Thread` is started, this method will continuously check if there are processes to be submitted, and submit them if the `ShortTermScheduler`'s load is below some limit.
      void setInterSchedulerInterface(InterSchedulerInterface interSchedulerInterface)
      Setter for `IntrSchedulerInterface` instance.
      void setNotificationInterface(NotificationInterface notificationInterface)
      Setter for `NotificationInterface` instance.
      boolean submitJob(java.lang.String fileName)
      Method used to create a `Process` instance from a file path, then submitting it to the `ShortTermScheduler` via an instance of `NotificationInterface`.

      • submitJob

        public boolean submitJob(java.lang.String fileName)
        Method used to create a `Process` instance from a file path, then submitting it to the `ShortTermScheduler` via an instance of `NotificationInterface`. Can also submit all files inside a directory.
        Specified by:
        submitJob in interface SubmissionInterface
        Parameters:
        fileName - - path to file or directory
        Returns:
        boolean - true if file was submitted successfully, false otherwise

      • displaySubmissionQueue

        public void displaySubmissionQueue()
        Displays all the processes that are in the submission queue of this scheduler waiting to be submitted to the ShortTermScheduler.
        Specified by:
        displaySubmissionQueue in interface SubmissionInterface

      • run

        public void run()
        When the `Thread` is started, this method will continuously check if there are processes to be submitted, and submit them if the `ShortTermScheduler`'s load is below some limit.
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable
        Overrides:
        run in class java.lang.Thread
